job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Integrate ML models into deployable Python applications and microservices using cloud infrastructure.
     * Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
     * Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices and standards.
     * Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

* Integrate ML models into deployable Python applications and microservices using cloud infrastructure.
     * Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
     * Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices and standards.
     * Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes integrating ML models into deployable Python applications and microservices, focusing on productionization and MLOps aspects. While Generative AI is mentioned in the context of the company's work, the core responsibilities listed align more closely with traditional ML model deployment and system integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate ML models into deployable Python applications and microservices
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of building and deploying software applications that incorporate machine learning models, which falls under traditional software development.
The mention of 'cloud infrastructure' in the context of deploying applications implies the need for managing and operating systems within a cloud environment, a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: Design reviews are a standard part of the software development lifecycle, involving technical and stakeholder collaboration to ensure the quality and alignment of system designs.

job_tasks.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure the consistent application of team best practices and standards.
job_tasks.justification: Code review is a fundamental software development practice aimed at improving code quality, consistency, and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.justification: System documentation and knowledge sharing are essential components of maintaining and developing software systems effectively.

soft_skills.phrase: Participate in and lead design reviews with peers and stakeholders.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration with peers and communication with stakeholders during design reviews.

soft_skills.phrase: Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback
soft_skills.justification: Providing feedback on code involves communication and collaboration with other developers.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to system documentation and team knowledge sharing.
soft_skills.justification: Knowledge sharing and documentation require effective communication and collaboration within the team.

soft_skills.phrase: ensure the consistent application of team best practices and standards.
soft_skills.justification: Adhering to and ensuring team best practices implies a commitment to learning and adapting to established methodologies.
Leading design reviews suggests taking initiative and ownership of aspects of the project's technical direction.
